title: Aladdin Solitaire
description_short: Remove all cards by combining the same cards
description: Aladdin Solitaire is a classic card game where you remove all cards by combining the same cards.
description_full: Aladdin Solitaire is a classic card game where you remove all cards by combining the same cards.
controls: Use arrow keys or WASD to move your spaceship. Press SPACE to shoot. Collect power-ups to upgrade your weapons and defeat the alien invaders.
